entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023
